unnormalised: **Builder Reviews: Are You Booking Your Dream Home or a Nightmare?**
normalised: **Builder Reviews: Are You Booking Your Dream Home or a Nightmare?**

unnormalised: Mumbai: Forget *Housefull 4* – finding the right builder feels more chaotic than any Bollywood comedy these days! With so many new projects popping up from Bandra to Borivali, how do you know if that swanky brochure matches reality?
normalised: Mumbai: Forget *Housefull four* – finding the right builder feels more chaotic than any Bollywood comedy these days! With so many new projects popping up from Bandra to Borivali, how do you know if that swanky brochure matches reality?

unnormalised: Homebuyers are increasingly turning to online builder reviews before investing their hard-earned Rs. 2 Crore+ in a 2 BHK. Sites like Housing.com and NoBroker.com are filled with opinions, but it's buyer beware!
normalised: Homebuyers are increasingly turning to online builder reviews before investing their hard-earned rupees two crore plus in a two B H K. Sites like Housing dot com and NoBroker dot com are filled with opinions, but it's buyer beware!

unnormalised: "We found discrepancies between the advertised 'premium fittings' and what was actually installed," laments Sunita Sharma, who recently purchased a flat in a project near IIT Bombay. "The promised 5km jogging track was more like a crowded lane!"
normalised: "We found discrepancies between the advertised 'premium fittings' and what was actually installed," laments Sunita Sharma, who recently purchased a flat in a project near I I T Bombay. "The promised five kilometer jogging track was more like a crowded lane!"

unnormalised: Experts suggest cross-referencing reviews with RERA registration details and checking the builder's track record. Has their previous project in, say, Thane, faced major delays?
normalised: Experts suggest cross-referencing reviews with R E R A registration details and checking the builder's track record. Has their previous project in, say, Thane, faced major delays?

unnormalised: Even better, talk to existing residents! A little chai and gossip with your potential neighbors can reveal a lot more than any glossy advertisement ever will.
normalised: Even better, talk to existing residents! A little chai and gossip with your potential neighbors can reveal a lot more than any glossy advertisement ever will.

unnormalised: Don't just trust the smiling faces in the marketing campaign – do your homework! Your dream home shouldn't turn into a real estate nightmare.
normalised: Don't just trust the smiling faces in the marketing campaign – do your homework! Your dream home shouldn't turn into a real estate nightmare.
